name: ipvive, inc.
tag_list: mobile, self-improvement, artificial-intelligence, semantic-web, emotion, social-crm, happiness
overview:
Frictionless Sharing of Objective Emotional Intelligence powered by like-to-like GLUE (geo-location, user-emotion) technology services and mobile applications enabling insights that will help people live a happier healthier life.

From audio and video files, our solution automatically extracts objective emotion, user identification and word/sentence context and groups and connects in an intelligent way based on semantic, contextual correlations to like kind.

Both individuals and their professional advisors seek a pragmatic, cost-, and time-effective way to increase objective self-awareness, emotional intelligence, and the ability to be happy.

As difficult as it sounds, self-awareness and emotional intelligence improvement can be a straightforward thing. It’s relatively easy to become more fit (diet and exercise) or even to become smarter (read more and attend classes on a topic). But how do you possibly approach making yourself better at understanding emotions? We believe our invention, like-to-like GLUE, and multi-sided market opportunity can improve perceptive and objective understanding of ones emotional mind.

milestones.description: Invented, prototyped and commercially tested like-to-like GLUE (geo-location, user emotion) which automatically extracts subliminal emotions from audio and video files.
milestones.source_description: Ipvive commercially pilots like-to-like GLUE, a method to create emotional mapping

milestones.description: Ipvive Restarts Operations and Repositions for Growth with First of Kind Mobile Application Powered by like-to-like GLUE
milestones.source_description: Ipvive Restarts Operations and Repositions for Growth with First of Kind Mobile Application Powered by like-to-like GLUE
